page.title: 18HOUSING IN CHARLBURY
page.content: Charlbury has a very different variety of houses,from old Cotswold stone to the modern brick houses.The houses,which are Cotswold stone, are fairly small and have low roofs. They take up about half of Charlbury. Modern brick houses are mostly built in estates.There are several modern estates offering detatched, semi- detatched and terraced housing.The council estate offers rented housing for those who do not wish to own their own house.All the estates are built out of the town centre and the older houses are built in and around the town. Spelsbury is mainly stone and has about three thatched cottages.In Chadlington there is a variety of housing.In this area there is much renovation.
